abstract: The LG Shine, available now from AT&T Wireless for $149 with a two-year contract and rebate, has a 2.2-inch screen with a reflective coating.
snippet: The LG Shine, available now from AT&T Wireless for $149 with a two-year contract and rebate, has a 2.2-inch screen with a reflective coating.
lead_paragraph: Many cellphones feature high-resolution cameras, powerful processors and full keyboards. This one offers a screen that turns into a mirror, essentially making the pocket compact obsolete.

headline.main: CIRCUITS: A Fashion-Conscious Smartphone, Cloaked in a Mirror
